itunes:title: Episode 226 - Don't Touch The Thermostat!
title: Episode 226 - Don't Touch The Thermostat!
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson, Mat Best, and Evan Hafer discuss why women shouldn't be allowed to touch a thermostat, how having children makes you a nicer person, and a service you can pay for to put up Christmas lights.
